Question: On the set of Jailhouse Rock, this person granted him an interview, though he was no longer dealing with the mainstream press.
Hints: In September 1941, this person entered first grade at East Tupelo Consolidated, where his instructors regarded him as "average".
This person failed to appear in Baton Rouge; he was unable to get out of his hotel bed, and the rest of the tour was cancelled.
In February 1961, this person performed two shows for a benefit event in Memphis, on behalf of 24 local charities.
